name: Jigsaw: The Ultimate Electronic Puzzle
overview: Jigsaw: The Ultimate Electronic Puzzle is a collection of digital Jigsaw puzzles. The game allows you to choose a picture from its library and select the number of pieces (3,000 to 15,000) and shape of the pieces. The game has a simple aid function that shows the correct location for a piece with a simple button press. The game is accompanied with a soothing New Age soundtrack.
